cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I shine during the day. What am I?
I am round and I go around the Sun. You live here! What am I?
I shine at night and sometimes have craters. What am I?
I am a very big ball of gas that shines really brightly far away. What am I?

hints.text: 🔭 You can see me through a telescope.
✨ The Sun is one of me!

cosmos.question: I am a group of many stars that make a picture. What am I?

hints.text: ursa 🐻 You might know the Big Bear
✨ I am made up of stars.
🌌 Some people use me to navigate.

cosmos.question: I am a cold, rocky object that orbits the Sun, but I'm too small to be a planet. What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 There are many of me in a belt.
🧱 I am made of rock and metal.
💥 Sometimes I can hit a planet.

cosmos.question: I am a giant spinning group of stars, dust, and gas, and our solar system lives inside me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I am shaped like a spiral.
🌌 There are billions of stars in me.
🥛 My name sounds like something you drink!

cosmos.question: I am a burning ball of ice and dust that travels through space and sometimes has a tail. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I leave a bright streak in the sky.
🧊 I am made of frozen gas and dust.
🧹 Some people call me a 'dirty snowball'.

cosmos.question: I am a place in space where gravity is so strong that nothing, not even light, can escape. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I am formed from a dead star.

cosmos.question: I am a cloud of dust and gas in space where stars are born. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I am made up of gas and dust.

ocean.question: I am big and blue, and fish like to swim in me. What am I?
I am a home for a hermit crab, and you can find me on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I can be smooth or rough.

ocean.question: I wiggle and swim in the ocean. I am covered in scales. What am I?

hints.text: 🍽️ Cats sometimes like to eat me.

ocean.question: I am a very big fish with sharp teeth. People can be scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🎥 You might have seen me in a movie.

ocean.question: I'm a colorful, slow-moving creature with a hard shell, often found on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I can live a very long time.

ocean.question: I live in the sea and have eight arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🦑 I squirt ink when I am scared.

ocean.question: I am a very large animal that lives in the ocean and sings songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I make sounds to talk to my friends.
🐳 I am a mammal, not a fish.
🌬️ I breathe air through a blowhole.

ocean.question: I am a long, thin fish that hides in the sand. If you step on me, I can sting you! What am I?

hints.text: 🪱 I like to bury myself in the sand.
🏖️ I blend in with the sand.

ocean.question: I am a group of tiny animals that build big, colorful homes underwater. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 Fish like to live near me.

ocean.question: I am a very deep, dark part of the ocean where sunlight doesn't reach. What am I?

hints.text: 🔦 It is very dark where I am.
🏔️ It is very far from the surface.
